string.text:
There are many options for a different rifle cartridge. Standard cartridge - 7.62x51 mm NATO (.308 Win). Technically, it is a magazine rifle with a longitudinally sliding rotary bolt. Store capacity depends on the caliber and can be from 3 to 5. It is a top product from Remington Arms.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes for Picatinny rail 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] KZRZP suppressor (after modification) 
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Ghillie camo net (applied when attaching a suppressor)
